sentence: Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.) has been hit with a new ethics complaint by a political action committee seeking to unseat him that hits the embattled lawmaker with a host of accusations.
author: Emily Brooks
title: Cawthorn hit with new ethics complaint filed by rival PAC

sentence: "Mr. Smith apparently lives with Rep. Cawthorn and various social media postings by them indicate a personal relationship between them, separate and apart from the professional relationship of employer and employee," the political group, Fire Madison Cawthorn, said in its complaint.
author: Andrew Kerr
title: Sex jokes feature in ethics complaint over Cawthorn relationship with staffer

sentence: The Fire Madison Cawthorn group, operated by the American Muckrakers PAC, accused the North Carolina congressman of ethical violations, including paying thousands of dollars worth of gifts, loans and other benefits to his staffer and close aide, Stephen Smith, 23, which were not declared.
author: Ewan Palmer
title: What Madison Cawthorn, Stephen Smith Venmo Messages Say

sentence: The Fire Madison Cawthorn group, which is operated by the American Muckrakers PAC, also submitted screenshots of what is believed to be Venmo payments between Smith and the congressman with notes such as "Getting naked for me in Sweden," "The stuff we did in Amsterdam," and "The quickie at the airport" and "breaking and entering."
author: Ewan Palmer
title: Who is Stephen Smith? Madison Cawthorn Staffer Appears to Grope Him in Clip

sentence: Madison Cawthorn (@CawthornforNC) April 29, 2022 Cawthorn, 26, went on to maintain that he "looked damn good on that cruise ship," apparently referring to now-viral photos of him wearing women's lingerie on a cruise ship that were leaked to the press last week.
author: Aila Slisco
title: 'Pathetic': Madison Cawthorn Responds to Ethics Complaint Over Conduct

Cawthorn of misconduct, files ethics complaint WLOS, Samiar Nefzi, 4/29/2022 Congressman Madison Cawthorn is now facing a complaint, accusing him of several ethical violations.
title: DKos Asheville Open Thread: Mad
